info.name: Stakeholders.Web
info.description:
Here you can find samples how to use Stakeholders.Web REST API. 
Import this collection to Postman, replace the domain name (http://localhost:33347) if needed
If API call requires no authorization (no need for header "Authorization: Bearer token", register new user via POST http://localhost:33347/ApplicationUsers or login via POST http://localhost:33347/token), run.
If API call requires authorization (header "Authorization: Bearer token" is required), signup first (POST http://localhost:33347/ApplicationUsers), then login (POST http://localhost:33347/ApplicationUsers) and replace token in API call's header "Authorization: Bearer token" with the generated one, then run.
Replace IDs in URI and edit JSON if needed.
